name: masturbation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of touching or rubbing your sexual organs in order to give yourself sexual pleasure: Few people today believe that masturbation is unhealthy.
the act of touching or rubbing someone's sexual organs in order to give them sexual pleasure: mutual masturbation See
masturbate
More examplesFewer examplesOn average, boys discover masturbation at age 13.Masturbation is a way to get in touch with your own desires, in addition to helping relieve stress.She can't understand why sex, especially masturbation, would be a sin.Some people came to view such activities as oral sex or mutual masturbation as not even as sex at all.They regularly indulge in masturbation together.
